changes.change: Updated dependency so users below iOS 13 can install it again.
Fixed preferences UI looking weird in light mode.
You can now use the "Zoom by default" feature to zoom in by default even without limiting the zoom to 18:9 aspect ratio.

Hopefully solved the bug where if you have cercube installed, the preferences for my tweak would crash (rebuilt preferences from scratch and its working on my iPhone X iOS 13). I also don't experience the problem where if you have Cercube installed my tweak wouldn't work in youtube.
You can now use the "Zoom by default" feature to zoom in by default even without limiting the zoom to 18:9 aspect ratio.
You can now use the "Zoom by default" feature to zoom in by default even without limiting the zoom to 18:9 aspect ratio.
PayPal donation button now actually works!
